title: Update: We Can't Believe How Much Weight Tommy Has Lost Already!
description:
Yesterday, Tommy agreed to lose 80 lbs. by Christmas to get $2,050, and it seemed to upset a lot of people.
A Bert Show listener said "Don’t do this Tommy. Seriously, try a healthier way. The minute I read this I felt sad for you. That is a full-time, #biggestloser style goal. Can you not just get paid for every pound you lose
between now and then and celebrate that, without making unhealthy challenges for content?"
Money will make almost anyone do almost anything. And for Tommy that “thing” is to lose weight.
